actions: Tonifies Qi and Blood, strengthens the Spleen, raises the Yang Qi of the Spleen and Stomach, tonifies the Lungs and aids circulation of moisture downward from the face.
With Zhi Fu Zi, for Yang Deficiency with spontaneous sweat.
Restores Devastated Yang Warms Ming Men Fire and assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang
Warms the Middle and disperses Cold.

symptoms: Spontaneous perspiration which is worse on exertion
Profuse sweating from the head and face
Pale or bright white facial complexion

modifications.purpose: sweating from the head and face
